attributes.action: increase penalties for handheld mobile phone use whilst driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A lot of no notice is taken of the law banning handheld phones whilst driving. I see as many people using their phones now as I did before the ban was in place. This morning a van nearly hit my car on the bend of a country road as the driver was holding his phone to his ear and not fully in control of his vehicle.

I think it would concentrate the mind wonderfully if one was automatically banned from driving for 3 months for violating this law, except in emergency, of course.
